title: D Mark Biosciences
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: d_mark_biosciences
categories: []

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $386.2K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with D Mark Biosciences. The average
  contract duration was 0.37 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $145.6K. The longest
  contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.4M.
lookup_name: 'D MARK BIOSCIENCES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '386.2K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '37'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '3%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '138%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '137.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.37'
s421_mean_contract_value: '145.6K'
s425_max_duration: '3'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.4M'
---
